meanings.sent1: The loculated box had separate sections for each type of tool.
meanings.sent2: The loculated candy box had different flavors in each compartment.
meanings.sent3: The loculated backpack made it easy to organize all my school supplies.
meanings.sent4: Her loculated mind kept her thoughts neatly separated like files in a cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The loculated drawer system helped keep all the small items in place.

meanings.definition: Formed into small cavities or chambers.
meanings.sent1: The loculated sponge had tiny pockets that held water.
meanings.sent2: The loculated rock formation had small caves for animals to hide in.
meanings.sent3: The loculated ice cube tray made miniature ice cubes for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her loculated heart held small chambers of love for different people.
meanings.sent5: The loculated tree trunk provided homes for various insects.

meanings.sent1: The loculated jar stored pickles in individual compartments.
meanings.sent2: The loculated hive had separate chambers for different bee activities.
meanings.sent3: The loculated purse kept coins in their own little pockets.
meanings.sent4: His loculated speech had distinct sections for greetings and farewells.
meanings.sent5: The loculated cloud held tiny raindrops waiting to fall.
